channel.title: My Custom owner crown wont show up
channel.description: Hey I really need big help! I was trying to add a owner crown to my client but i folowed some tut and it didnt work. now only the player thats the owner can see the crown but no one else can. Please can someone help me fix my crown! I really need this fixed!

item.title: My Custom owner crown wont show up
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

Well I am using DeltaScape’s client… And I followed a tut that said to use the cache editor and make one and fine codes in client.java. I couldn’t find half the codes so i dont think I can add a new one. But now i cant go back and undo it because i dont know what i changed. The Tut said it worked on delta client but it has code thats not in it… anyways i really want my crown to work.

P.S. There is no existing crowns like you say… only the mod admin ones in the cache. -.-

Thank you,
Ghostly150

Read full topic
item.source: My Custom owner crown wont show up

item.title: My Custom owner crown wont show up
item.dc:creator: @Nameme123 Nameme123
item.description:
@Nameme123 wrote:

All you need to do is locate is with your Class8.java and locate the sprite with the correct code.

item.title: My Custom owner crown wont show up

@Noob_I_Own_U wrote:

dnt try add a new one all you have to do is open the old crown and edit it
